network

Class ShannonsModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • network.ShannonsModel

  • public class ShannonsModel
extends java.util.Observable
    This class represents the data model of the program and performs the calculations for the Shannons' Theorem formula.
    Version:
    1.0.0 2016-10-08
    Author:
    Eric Maryan
